from wikipedia/google , "diamonds and rust"
   
  ".....In the song, Baez recounts an out-of-the-blue phone call from an old lover, which sends her a decade back in time, to a seedy hotel in Greenwich Village. She recalls giving him a pair of cuff links, and summarizes that memories ..."
    
   
  out of the blue call {ive been getting them all week too-males with german accents calling ultra long distance asking for "ruth" sometimes.  1940s background noise.
   
  time traveling future american english voices
   
  dimonds and rust; ok, will keep on that awhile, just to see.
